content: Southampton + Arsenal + São PauloSaturday + SundayFootball Prediction ContestGame 1:  Southampton v Fulham  (Saturday)https://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/england/premier-league/southampton-fc-v-fulham-fc-644eee22271df117a10d0936Game 2:  Arsenal v Brighton  (Sunday)https://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/england/premier-league/arsenal-fc-v-brighton-hove-albion-644eefff600cea72e0c827f1Game 3:  São Paulo v Corinthians  (Sunday)https://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/brazil/brasileiro-serie-a/sc-corinthians-sp-v-sao-paulo-fc-sp-6455260389e5400c1e590351RulesThis Prediction must be for all 3 games1.  Predict the TOTAL combined amount of Fouls + Offsides + Corner Kicks in the game2.  Tiebreaker:  Predict the MINUTE of the 1st Goal Scored (doesn't matter which team scores, VOID if no goals are scored)ExampleGame 1:  40, 21'Game 2:  40, 22'Game 3:  40, 25'PrizesThe closest prediction wins a 1 mbtc Free BetIf you correctly predict the TOTAL combined amount of Fouls + Offsides + Corner Kicks in the game and successfully predict the MINUTE of the 1st Goal Scored, your Free Bet will be for  3 mbtc (1 mbtc if 1st Goal Scored MINUTE occurs in stoppage time)(Small print)* Must be active in Sports betting and/or Sports betting discussion (some exceptions) *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion **

comments.author: jeremypwr
comments.body: Sportsbet.io has been kind enough to sponsor my Prediction Contests and Promos for a while now.Sportsbet.io is a sports betting website; therefore these Prediction Contests and Promos are catered to those who actually bet on/discuss sports.Given the nature of my threads, please do not bother making a Prediction if you have not read the OP and qualify.If you are unsure if you qualify, just shoot me a PM.   Thank you for your cooperation.
